column2: In battle Drazhoath leads his war hosts mounted upon the Great Taurus Cinderbreath, bringing fire and ruin down upon the enemy.
Chaos Dwarf Sorcerers have used Lammasu as steeds for thousands of years.
None but the highest and most powerful servants of Hashut can hope to master these hellish monsters.
None but the highest and most powerful servants of Hashut can hope to master these hellish monsters.
Da Khan getz da biggest barka', nuff sed.
